title: The Great escape (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Prisoners of war
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Escapes
description: A classic Hollywood war film, combining a gift for storytelling with bravura and blockbuster entertainment. Set in a high security German P.O.W. camp, the Allied prisoners are determined to do more than wait out the war and plan a daring escapes. Steve McQueen slams his motorbike into top gear and hurtles us into an adventure accompanied by stars the calibre of James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson and James Coburn. Based on the novel by Paul Brickhill.
